name: Silly Shapes
description:
Shapeshift... literally! 3 Shapes: Square, Circle, Triangle. Use your fast reflexes to change into those 3 shapes and pass through the gates. Try to get the highest score possible in this silly, fun, and impossible game.

Originally created in April 2016 for Ludum Dare 35. Developed in 48 hours by Justin Nauta, based on the Theme "Shapeshift". Re-Uploaded to this website, but left unchanged for posterity purposes.
